select rec.id as id, rec.nombre as nombre, rec.descripcion as descripcion, rec.cantidad as cantidad, rec.categoria as categoria
from recursos as rec, (select rec.id as id,count( (clas.id)) as num from clases as clas left join recursos_concedidos on recursos_concedidos.clase_id=clas.id left join recursos as rec on recursos_concedidos.recurso_id=rec.id where rec.categoria=#{nombreCategoria} and clas.fecha=#{fecha} and (((clas.hora_inicio >#{inicio}) or (clas.hora_inicio=#{inicio}) ) and (clas.hora_inicio < {fin})) GROUP BY id)x where x.id=rec.id and recursos.cantidad &gt x.num;
